titleStmt.title: James W. Nye to James F. Robinson
CWG7785

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, James F. Robinson: Appointments by the Governor, Civil Appointments, 1862-1863

body.p:
Territory of Nevada
Executive Department
Carson City Nov 3rd 1862
Sir
An application having been made to your Excellency by Wm A B von Bokkelen for an appointment as Commissioner of Deeds &c for your State to reside in Virginia City, Storey County, Nevada Territory.

I take pleasure in Stating that the applicant is personally known to me, and I deem him qualified to properly discharge the duties of that office, and would request a favorable consideration of his application

Yours respectfully
James W Nye
Gov N. T.

To His Excellency
J F Robinson
Gov of Kentucky
